text: Govind Singh Thakur is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Himachal Pradesh Legislative Assembly from Manali in the 2007, 2012 and 2017 Himachal Pradesh Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He held the chair as Minister of Forest, Transport, Youth Services and Sports till 31 July 2020,presently he is Education & Language and Culture Minister in Jai Ram Thakur cabinet.My NetaMember's ProfileHimachal Pradesh: Jai Ram Thakur ordered magisterial inquiryRace for cabinet berths hots up in Himachal PradeshManali hoteliers oppose Rohtang ropeway, ski resort ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Himachal Pradesh Legislative Assembly Category:People from Manali, Himachal Pradesh Category:Himachal Pradesh MLAs 2017– Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Himachal Pradesh
title: Govind Singh Thakur
